title: Bagdad Typeface!!?
content:

Can someone please ID this font for me?

All the best  
Rick

comments.content: Also very close to [Caslon Fina Stencil](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105519/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner_flake/caslon_fina_stencil_black/&sample_text=CONTENTS). Here are more [serif stencils](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105519/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontcase/genres/stencil_serif/).

Hi Stephen,

It is very similar to that too! Really want to know this one, it has been bugging me for ages!!!

Thanks for the link!
